title: Hacked Resume Gives Inside Look at Wagner Group Founder Yevgeny Prigozhin
description:
The five-page document mentions a 1993 visit to the U.S. and a fantasy book the Russian mercenary leader co-wrote with his children.

title: As Texas Judge Stalls, the Abortion Rights Movement Won’t Wait
